MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

English.Keywords: Role Playing Game, Roleplaying Game, RPG, Star Trek, Decipher, Character Generator, Character Builder, Tools, Gaming
English.Char_Desc_450: Star Trek Character Builder simplifies the process of making a character for the Star Trek RPG line from Decipher,Inc (Coda system). Features include an easy-to-use interface, html character sheet, advancements (w/editor), the inclusion of custom data (w/ editor), installer and unistaller.
